itunes:title: #11: When Living in Your Head Soothes You
title: #11: When Living in Your Head Soothes You
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy and living in our heads are fancy coping mechanisms that keep us emotionally safe but also keeps us stuck.  In this episode, we break down what fantasy may look like in your everyday life, how it keeps you from the life you want, and a...
itunes:summary:
Fantasy and living in our heads are fancy coping mechanisms that keep us emotionally safe but also keeps us stuck. 

In this episode, we break down what fantasy may look like in your everyday life, how it keeps you from the life you want, and a practical step you can take to start to undo it.

 

Take Our Free Masterclass:
How to Heal from Low Self Worth & Stop Repeating Unhealthy Relationships - The 4 Step Roadmap to Breaking Toxic Habits and Getting the Relationships You Want This Year
